short_description.last_approved_text: The people here keep to themselves; untouched and unchecked by the guiding hand of government.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The people here keep to themselves; untouched and unchecked by the guiding hand of government.

short_description.last_approved_text: An emperor needs a throne.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: An emperor needs a throne.

short_description.last_approved_text: The finest administrators assemble in the capital.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The finest administrators assemble in the capital.

short_description.last_approved_text: Laws must be understood and applied precisely.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Laws must be understood and applied precisely.

short_description.last_approved_text: Even on the lowest rung of bureaucracy, excellence is expected.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Even on the lowest rung of bureaucracy, excellence is expected.

short_description.last_approved_text: Laws need a fair system to enforce them.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Laws need a fair system to enforce them.

short_description.last_approved_text: The law is absolute, and must be followed to the letter.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The law is absolute, and must be followed to the letter.

short_description.last_approved_text: The path to justice must be trodden carefully.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The path to justice must be trodden carefully.

short_description.last_approved_text: Appeal truthfully, or compound the judgement.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Appeal truthfully, or compound the judgement.

short_description.last_approved_text: Each digit of a hand must work in concert or fumble and fail to grasp when needed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Each digit of a hand must work in concert or fumble and fail to grasp when needed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Government needs strong foundations.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Government needs strong foundations.

short_description.last_approved_text: A palace befitting its ruler.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A palace befitting its ruler.

short_description.last_approved_text: Laws bound by the written word.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Laws bound by the written word.

short_description.last_approved_text: There must be organisation amongst thieves, or they will be undone by chaos.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There must be organisation amongst thieves, or they will be undone by chaos.

short_description.last_approved_text: A haven from the tyranny of law.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A haven from the tyranny of law.

short_description.last_approved_text: Even bandits require a dwelling where they can rest, eat and plan.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Even bandits require a dwelling where they can rest, eat and plan.

short_description.last_approved_text: A place where the disenfranchised and rebellious can gather.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A place where the disenfranchised and rebellious can gather.

short_description.last_approved_text: A stronghold to unite those who would fight the oppressors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A stronghold to unite those who would fight the oppressors.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lawlessness does not necessarily mean chaos.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Lawlessness does not necessarily mean chaos.

short_description.last_approved_text: A board of administrators bring order and oversight.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A board of administrators bring order and oversight.

short_description.last_approved_text: An imposing fortress from which to run a bandit empire.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: An imposing fortress from which to run a bandit empire.

short_description.last_approved_text: Trust may be gained by an offer of shelter.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Trust may be gained by an offer of shelter.

short_description.last_approved_text: From the mountains, bandits gather.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From the mountains, bandits gather.

short_description.last_approved_text: Do not employ vipers and complain when they bite.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Do not employ vipers and complain when they bite.

short_description.last_approved_text: From bandit to warlord, a driving ambition is now realised in a grand palace.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: From bandit to warlord, a driving ambition is now realised in a grand palace.

short_description.last_approved_text: A refuge for the hunted and those who defy the oppressors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A refuge for the hunted and those who defy the oppressors.

short_description.last_approved_text: Protection provides respite from bedlam, and an opportunity to find answers to it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Protection provides respite from bedlam, and an opportunity to find answers to it.

short_description.last_approved_text: A secretariat oversees matters of government and ensures clarity succeeds over chaos.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A secretariat oversees matters of government and ensures clarity succeeds over chaos.

short_description.last_approved_text: When operating outside the law, ensure your defences can withstand the heaviest blow.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When operating outside the law, ensure your defences can withstand the heaviest blow.

short_description.last_approved_text: The administration of a commandery is directed from its capital.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The administration of a commandery is directed from its capital.

short_description.last_approved_text: This magnificent city is a testament to ambition, its reach and influence extending over the entire commandery.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This magnificent city is a testament to ambition, its reach and influence extending over the entire commandery.

short_description.last_approved_text: Homes, work and trade can all be found at the commandery’s centre.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Homes, work and trade can all be found at the commandery’s centre.

short_description.last_approved_text: No matter its size, a village remains the administrative centre of a commandery.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: No matter its size, a village remains the administrative centre of a commandery.

short_description.last_approved_text: Self-correction serves the community.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Self-correction serves the community.

short_description.last_approved_text: Inner and outer life are equal.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Inner and outer life are equal.

short_description.last_approved_text: The past informs the future.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The past informs the future.

short_description.last_approved_text: All have a duty to fight for China, willingly or otherwise.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All have a duty to fight for China, willingly or otherwise.

short_description.last_approved_text: To keep will and spirit resolute, the body must have sustenance.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To keep will and spirit resolute, the body must have sustenance.

short_description.last_approved_text: A land that supports itself reinforces the efforts of war.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A land that supports itself reinforces the efforts of war.

short_description.last_approved_text: Recruitment of troops must increase in accord with the escalation of war.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Recruitment of troops must increase in accord with the escalation of war.

short_description.last_approved_text: Marshal the able-bodied to serve their country.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Marshal the able-bodied to serve their country.

short_description.last_approved_text: An army that lives as one, fights as one.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: An army that lives as one, fights as one.

short_description.last_approved_text: Without discipline, a military force is no more than an armed mob.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Without discipline, a military force is no more than an armed mob.

short_description.last_approved_text: The depths hold a rich vein of minerals.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The depths hold a rich vein of minerals.

short_description.last_approved_text: Industry grows with the population.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Industry grows with the population.

short_description.last_approved_text: A community that works towards one goal.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A community that works towards one goal.

short_description.last_approved_text: Mining copper is easier when its face is exposed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Mining copper is easier when its face is exposed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Regulated production strengthens legal tender.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Regulated production strengthens legal tender.

short_description.last_approved_text: Metal the colour of the sun.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Metal the colour of the sun.

short_description.last_approved_text: This armourer’s name is as famous as their creations.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This armourer’s name is as famous as their creations.

short_description.last_approved_text: Armour fit for an emperor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Armour fit for an emperor.

short_description.last_approved_text: Armour of magnificent quality is forged here.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Armour of magnificent quality is forged here.

short_description.last_approved_text: To be encouraged, potential must first be recognised.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To be encouraged, potential must first be recognised.

short_description.last_approved_text: Great warriors deserve great steeds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Great warriors deserve great steeds.

short_description.last_approved_text: Some beasts have the warrior spirit.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Some beasts have the warrior spirit.

short_description.last_approved_text: This weaponsmith’s name is as famous as their creations.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: This weaponsmith’s name is as famous as their creations.

short_description.last_approved_text: A weaponsmith favoured by heaven.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A weaponsmith favoured by heaven.

short_description.last_approved_text: Weapons of magnificent quality are forged here.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Weapons of magnificent quality are forged here.

short_description.last_approved_text: Laws and taxes must be rigidly enforced to prevent chaos.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Laws and taxes must be rigidly enforced to prevent chaos.

short_description.last_approved_text: The seeds of a dynasty must be seen to perform heroic deeds.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The seeds of a dynasty must be seen to perform heroic deeds.

short_description.last_approved_text: Effective administration is achieved through a clear hierarchy and scrutiny.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Effective administration is achieved through a clear hierarchy and scrutiny.

short_description.last_approved_text: A throne from which to rule over the Zhong dynasty.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A throne from which to rule over the Zhong dynasty.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Yuan family’s decrees are law, bound by the written word.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Yuan family’s decrees are law, bound by the written word.

short_description.last_approved_text: Trade does not exist in a vacuum, and it is in everyone’s interests to establish good practices.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Trade does not exist in a vacuum, and it is in everyone’s interests to establish good practices.

short_description.last_approved_text: The morning bell and dusk drum frees the people from dreams and readies them for rest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The morning bell and dusk drum frees the people from dreams and readies them for rest.

short_description.last_approved_text: A little excitement is good for business, but regulation is needed to prevent it spilling into chaos.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A little excitement is good for business, but regulation is needed to prevent it spilling into chaos.

short_description.last_approved_text: A market is large enough to accommodate a greater assortment of goods in price and kind, to satisfy greater customer demands.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A market is large enough to accommodate a greater assortment of goods in price and kind, to satisfy greater customer demands.

short_description.last_approved_text: When too much wealth is being acquired too quickly, it is time to contribute some of that good fortune towards the betterment of all.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When too much wealth is being acquired too quickly, it is time to contribute some of that good fortune towards the betterment of all.

short_description.last_approved_text: Warehouses provides storage for goods, so customers are not disappointed and look elsewhere for their purchases.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Warehouses provides storage for goods, so customers are not disappointed and look elsewhere for their purchases.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is not necessary to trade in exotic and luxurious items to turn a profit; commonplace goods are always needed, and more often.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is not necessary to trade in exotic and luxurious items to turn a profit; commonplace goods are always needed, and more often.

short_description.last_approved_text: The latest and most popular silk designs can be perused at leisure to tempt those who can afford its luxuries.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The latest and most popular silk designs can be perused at leisure to tempt those who can afford its luxuries.

short_description.last_approved_text: Before a weapon is wielded, it must be tested.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Before a weapon is wielded, it must be tested.

short_description.last_approved_text: The quality of armour is the difference between life and death.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The quality of armour is the difference between life and death.

short_description.last_approved_text: The reach of a bow far exceeds the sword and spear.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The reach of a bow far exceeds the sword and spear.

short_description.last_approved_text: Heat forges metal as battle forges warriors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Heat forges metal as battle forges warriors.

short_description.last_approved_text: A warrior is only as good as their sharpest blade.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A warrior is only as good as their sharpest blade.

short_description.last_approved_text: A structure for both community and commerce.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A structure for both community and commerce.

short_description.last_approved_text: A wharf hastens the journey - and the amount - of fish from sea to village.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A wharf hastens the journey - and the amount - of fish from sea to village.

short_description.last_approved_text: A thriving fishing port is a valuable source of income and food.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A thriving fishing port is a valuable source of income and food.

short_description.last_approved_text: A shipyard tends to the construction and repair of ships.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A shipyard tends to the construction and repair of ships.

short_description.last_approved_text: By which deep sea fishing is possible for those without 'sea legs'.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: By which deep sea fishing is possible for those without 'sea legs'.

short_description.last_approved_text: A village with a proud fishing tradition.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A village with a proud fishing tradition.

short_description.last_approved_text: Each civilian is a potential soldier.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Each civilian is a potential soldier.

short_description.last_approved_text: Cavalry archers command both speed and reach.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Cavalry archers command both speed and reach.

short_description.last_approved_text: Fear is a powerful weapon.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Fear is a powerful weapon.

short_description.last_approved_text: All must stand ready.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All must stand ready.

short_description.last_approved_text: Discipline breeds character.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Discipline breeds character.

short_description.last_approved_text: Be as ruthless in government as in battle.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Be as ruthless in government as in battle.

short_description.last_approved_text: All towards the grand campaign.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All towards the grand campaign.

short_description.last_approved_text: Harness the land’s natural wonders for the common good.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Harness the land’s natural wonders for the common good.

short_description.last_approved_text: Work can build a community, as it grows in concert with the crops it cultivates.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Work can build a community, as it grows in concert with the crops it cultivates.

short_description.last_approved_text: A new start and a new hope for the destitute and unemployed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A new start and a new hope for the destitute and unemployed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Every seed has a season; a time to grow and a time to be harvested.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Every seed has a season; a time to grow and a time to be harvested.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ready and easy access to tools is vital for increased efficiency.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Ready and easy access to tools is vital for increased efficiency.

short_description.last_approved_text: New advances increase the ebb and flow from the source.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: New advances increase the ebb and flow from the source.

short_description.last_approved_text: Not all parts are useful; discard waste to improve and preserve quality.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Not all parts are useful; discard waste to improve and preserve quality.

short_description.last_approved_text: For a place to become a home, permanent roots of work and family must be planted.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For a place to become a home, permanent roots of work and family must be planted.

short_description.last_approved_text: A farm solely dedicated to providing food for the local army.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A farm solely dedicated to providing food for the local army.

short_description.last_approved_text: A more permanent military farm for key strategic settlements.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A more permanent military farm for key strategic settlements.

short_description.last_approved_text: New settlers are assigned to this farm to increase crop yields.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: New settlers are assigned to this farm to increase crop yields.

short_description.last_approved_text: Vital resources must be protected with the same vigour as homes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Vital resources must be protected with the same vigour as homes.

short_description.last_approved_text: A grain farm supported by the rent from the local peasants.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A grain farm supported by the rent from the local peasants.

short_description.last_approved_text: A magnificent estate to exhibit the fine produce made here.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A magnificent estate to exhibit the fine produce made here.

short_description.last_approved_text: In time, the smallest seeds can feed a village.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In time, the smallest seeds can feed a village.

short_description.last_approved_text: Cooperation yields more than competition.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Cooperation yields more than competition.

short_description.last_approved_text: A fertile foundation must be prepared to yield good crops.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A fertile foundation must be prepared to yield good crops.

short_description.last_approved_text: Farms run by soldiers to feed soldiers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Farms run by soldiers to feed soldiers.

short_description.last_approved_text: A fertile foundation must be prepared to yield good crops.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A fertile foundation must be prepared to yield good crops.

short_description.last_approved_text: Even a small field of rice can feed many.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Even a small field of rice can feed many.

short_description.last_approved_text: A community that pools their resources will profit in spirit and wealth.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A community that pools their resources will profit in spirit and wealth.

short_description.last_approved_text: Rice paddies stretching far across the horizon? A sign of prosperity.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Rice paddies stretching far across the horizon? A sign of prosperity.

short_description.last_approved_text: Manipulation of water sources results in greater growth.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Manipulation of water sources results in greater growth.

short_description.last_approved_text: All debts must be paid.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All debts must be paid.

short_description.last_approved_text: All bureaucratic components must work as one.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All bureaucratic components must work as one.

short_description.last_approved_text: Let conscience and morality guide government.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Let conscience and morality guide government.

short_description.last_approved_text: Government must be administered with honour.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Government must be administered with honour.

short_description.last_approved_text: Work is improved under a watchful eye.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Work is improved under a watchful eye.

short_description.last_approved_text: Separation of duties improves efficiency.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Separation of duties improves efficiency.

short_description.last_approved_text: Care for the roots, and a tree will flourish.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Care for the roots, and a tree will flourish.

short_description.last_approved_text: The wheels of bureaucracy are hastened with more officers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The wheels of bureaucracy are hastened with more officers.

short_description.last_approved_text: Taxation provides the seeds of growth.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Taxation provides the seeds of growth.

short_description.last_approved_text: Applied fairly, taxation can benefit all.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Applied fairly, taxation can benefit all.

short_description.last_approved_text: A trader established at the dock has an intimate knowledge of the most profitable hauls.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A trader established at the dock has an intimate knowledge of the most profitable hauls.

short_description.last_approved_text: More space for fishing boats to dock increases the quantity of goods that can be brought ashore.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: More space for fishing boats to dock increases the quantity of goods that can be brought ashore.

short_description.last_approved_text: A lively and profitable fishing hub which grows with each new haul.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A lively and profitable fishing hub which grows with each new haul.

short_description.last_approved_text: Trade flows as endlessly as the sea on which it arrives.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Trade flows as endlessly as the sea on which it arrives.

short_description.last_approved_text: To extend trade, extend its architecture.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To extend trade, extend its architecture.

short_description.last_approved_text: To live by the sea is an advantage that should be exploited.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To live by the sea is an advantage that should be exploited.

short_description.last_approved_text: With the development of the settlement comes greater opportunity.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: With the development of the settlement comes greater opportunity.

short_description.last_approved_text: A port specialising in trade can bend all resources towards it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A port specialising in trade can bend all resources towards it.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are as many opportunities as there are flavours.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: There are as many opportunities as there are flavours.

short_description.last_approved_text: Selective breeding creates physical advantages that cannot be taught.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Selective breeding creates physical advantages that cannot be taught.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wild horses must be conditioned for the cacophony of war.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wild horses must be conditioned for the cacophony of war.

short_description.last_approved_text: As with soldiers, horses need to be fed well to fight well.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: As with soldiers, horses need to be fed well to fight well.

short_description.last_approved_text: Warriors deserve horses that match their stature.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Warriors deserve horses that match their stature.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wildness and power can be shaped towards war.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wildness and power can be shaped towards war.

short_description.last_approved_text: Rumours, as well as horses, are exchanged here.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Rumours, as well as horses, are exchanged here.

short_description.last_approved_text: Informal conversation sometimes achieves more than official channels.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Informal conversation sometimes achieves more than official channels.

short_description.last_approved_text: Come for the rest, stay for the intrigue.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Come for the rest, stay for the intrigue.

short_description.last_approved_text: Rest and refreshment provide new perspectives.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Rest and refreshment provide new perspectives.

short_description.last_approved_text: Rest and refreshment restores focus for the weary traveller.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Rest and refreshment restores focus for the weary traveller.

short_description.last_approved_text: The presence of honourable persons encourages goodness in others.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The presence of honourable persons encourages goodness in others.

short_description.last_approved_text: When contemplation and rest can still be found far from home, they are worth paying for.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When contemplation and rest can still be found far from home, they are worth paying for.

short_description.last_approved_text: A gentleman is easy to serve, and hard to please.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A gentleman is easy to serve, and hard to please.

short_description.last_approved_text: Tea partnered with nature is a soothing combination.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Tea partnered with nature is a soothing combination.

short_description.last_approved_text: Let ideas conjugate as tea brews.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Let ideas conjugate as tea brews.

short_description.last_approved_text: Set aside time to drink tea and to listen.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Set aside time to drink tea and to listen.

short_description.last_approved_text: A noble must be accommodated to the high standards they expect at home.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A noble must be accommodated to the high standards they expect at home.

short_description.last_approved_text: Communication is vital to a stable rule.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Communication is vital to a stable rule.

short_description.last_approved_text: Let ideas conjugate as tea brews.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Let ideas conjugate as tea brews.

short_description.last_approved_text: Tea calms, and refreshes the spirit.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Tea calms, and refreshes the spirit.

short_description.last_approved_text: Set aside time to drink tea, and for listening.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Set aside time to drink tea, and for listening.

short_description.last_approved_text: A booming craftwork industry benefits all.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A booming craftwork industry benefits all.

short_description.last_approved_text: In fraught times, the arts provide respite.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: In fraught times, the arts provide respite.

short_description.last_approved_text: Without easy access to weapons, an army is at half-strength.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Without easy access to weapons, an army is at half-strength.

short_description.last_approved_text: Carry iron from earth into the hands of warriors.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Carry iron from earth into the hands of warriors.

short_description.last_approved_text: A permanent mining facility hastens the extraction of iron ore.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A permanent mining facility hastens the extraction of iron ore.

short_description.last_approved_text: The mining of iron is easier when tunnelling is not necessary.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The mining of iron is easier when tunnelling is not necessary.

short_description.last_approved_text: The earth offers resources, but some work is required to win it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The earth offers resources, but some work is required to win it.

short_description.last_approved_text: Purity is given form so that all can enjoy its inherent beauty.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Purity is given form so that all can enjoy its inherent beauty.

short_description.last_approved_text: A true artist works to reveal the truth in the material, not obscure it with ego.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A true artist works to reveal the truth in the material, not obscure it with ego.

short_description.last_approved_text: The essence of heaven and earth can be gathered for profit.

short_description.last_approved_text: Workshops run by the people for the people.

short_description.last_approved_text: Where all work as one towards a shared goal.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Where all work as one towards a shared goal.

short_description.last_approved_text: Production of goods and trade is streamlined with larger and more open buildings.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Production of goods and trade is streamlined with larger and more open buildings.

short_description.last_approved_text: The profits from the production of luxury goods can be put towards more worthy causes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The profits from the production of luxury goods can be put towards more worthy causes.

short_description.last_approved_text: Both luxury or practical items must be directed for the good of all.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Both luxury or practical items must be directed for the good of all.

short_description.last_approved_text: A secure place for like-minded individuals to congregate and discuss plans.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A secure place for like-minded individuals to congregate and discuss plans.

short_description.last_approved_text: The righteous gather here to meet, plan and recruit new followers.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The righteous gather here to meet, plan and recruit new followers.

short_description.last_approved_text: As the Yellow Turban movement grows, so must the meeting places of the faithful.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: As the Yellow Turban movement grows, so must the meeting places of the faithful.

short_description.last_approved_text: Inspirational figureheads are vital, but they are only as effective as those who relay their orders.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Inspirational figureheads are vital, but they are only as effective as those who relay their orders.

short_description.last_approved_text: All armies, sanctioned or otherwise, need a headquarters from which to organise and make plans.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All armies, sanctioned or otherwise, need a headquarters from which to organise and make plans.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Way of Supreme Peace points the way to wellness.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The Way of Supreme Peace points the way to wellness.

short_description.last_approved_text: Allow the Qi to flow freely and evenly for a healthy body and mind.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Allow the Qi to flow freely and evenly for a healthy body and mind.

short_description.last_approved_text: Diagnose the sickness and find a resonant medicine to heal it.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Diagnose the sickness and find a resonant medicine to heal it.

short_description.last_approved_text: Guidance on the proper medicines, applications and dosages of cures.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Guidance on the proper medicines, applications and dosages of cures.

short_description.last_approved_text: If the Taoist creed is to be followed, then the sick must be healed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: If the Taoist creed is to be followed, then the sick must be healed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Education returns power to the people.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Education returns power to the people.

short_description.last_approved_text: Informed discourse provides new perspectives, so a unified illumination can be acquired.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Informed discourse provides new perspectives, so a unified illumination can be acquired.

short_description.last_approved_text: Understanding is the key to many locks.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Understanding is the key to many locks.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ignore the bypaths, for the path of the great Tao is straight ahead.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Ignore the bypaths, for the path of the great Tao is straight ahead.

short_description.last_approved_text: Stillness is as beneficial as action.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Stillness is as beneficial as action.

short_description.last_approved_text: Be present and accepting of the moment to find peace.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Be present and accepting of the moment to find peace.

short_description.last_approved_text: Listen to the stream and learn stillness.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Listen to the stream and learn stillness.

short_description.last_approved_text: Isolation protects and encourages peacefulness.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Isolation protects and encourages peacefulness.

short_description.last_approved_text: As one approaches nothingness, they approach peace.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: As one approaches nothingness, they approach peace.

short_description.last_approved_text: All should share the responsibility for the welfare of the poor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All should share the responsibility for the welfare of the poor.

short_description.last_approved_text: Improved homes attract more workers and grow the community.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Improved homes attract more workers and grow the community.

short_description.last_approved_text: Foundations start with the family and are built upon from there.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Foundations start with the family and are built upon from there.

short_description.last_approved_text: When all hands lift equally, the burden is lightened.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: When all hands lift equally, the burden is lightened.

short_description.last_approved_text: Encourage growth in homes as well as industry to build lasting strength.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Encourage growth in homes as well as industry to build lasting strength.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wine, company and conversation can make a peasant feel like an emperor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Wine, company and conversation can make a peasant feel like an emperor.

short_description.last_approved_text: Pass around the jug of wine to share a drink and your troubles.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Pass around the jug of wine to share a drink and your troubles.

short_description.last_approved_text: Rest and refreshment provide new perspectives, and sometimes even solutions to pressing matters.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Rest and refreshment provide new perspectives, and sometimes even solutions to pressing matters.

short_description.last_approved_text: Informal conversation sometimes achieves more than bureaucratic hand-wringing.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Informal conversation sometimes achieves more than bureaucratic hand-wringing.

short_description.last_approved_text: Sometimes a loosening of the tongue can be a good thing.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Sometimes a loosening of the tongue can be a good thing.

short_description.last_approved_text: A place to organise the oppressed into something greater: a fighting force.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A place to organise the oppressed into something greater: a fighting force.

short_description.last_approved_text: Training is needed to focus righteous will into military strength.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Training is needed to focus righteous will into military strength.

short_description.last_approved_text: Martial arts cultivate discipline of the spirit as well as the body.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Martial arts cultivate discipline of the spirit as well as the body.

short_description.last_approved_text: Molten metal is cast into weapons.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Molten metal is cast into weapons.

short_description.last_approved_text: To relax vigilance is to invite attack.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: To relax vigilance is to invite attack.

short_description.last_approved_text: None fight with more zeal than those protecting their homes.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: None fight with more zeal than those protecting their homes.

short_description.last_approved_text: Marching armies rely on established supply bases to keep them equipped.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Marching armies rely on established supply bases to keep them equipped.

short_description.last_approved_text: Prepare for war to rob the enemy the advantage of surprise.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Prepare for war to rob the enemy the advantage of surprise.

short_description.last_approved_text: A store of supplies eliminates a potential weakness.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A store of supplies eliminates a potential weakness.

short_description.last_approved_text: The spoils of war must be accounted for to prevent corruption.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The spoils of war must be accounted for to prevent corruption.

short_description.last_approved_text: Plan for the unknown so you can quickly return to full strength when opportunity presents itself.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Plan for the unknown so you can quickly return to full strength when opportunity presents itself.

short_description.last_approved_text: The strength of resistance comes not from numbers, but careful preparation and the ability to react quickly.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The strength of resistance comes not from numbers, but careful preparation and the ability to react quickly.

short_description.last_approved_text: Anticipate attack at all times by having arms always within reach.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Anticipate attack at all times by having arms always within reach.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ambushes, attrition and local support – these are the weapons of the resistance.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Ambushes, attrition and local support – these are the weapons of the resistance.

short_description.last_approved_text: Put the means to produce in the hands of the people.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Put the means to produce in the hands of the people.

short_description.last_approved_text: The profits from harvest are shared in exchange for use of the land.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: The profits from harvest are shared in exchange for use of the land.

short_description.last_approved_text: A vast and profitable estate; a legacy built from a community where land is both home and work.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A vast and profitable estate; a legacy built from a community where land is both home and work.

short_description.last_approved_text: A new start brings new hope for the destitute and unemployed.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: A new start brings new hope for the destitute and unemployed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Work builds a community, and it grows in concert with the cultivated crops.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Work builds a community, and it grows in concert with the cultivated crops.

short_description.last_approved_text: For a place to become a home, permanent roots of work and family must be planted.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: For a place to become a home, permanent roots of work and family must be planted.

short_description.last_approved_text: Each step of farming is equally vital to the quality of the final harvest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Each step of farming is equally vital to the quality of the final harvest.

short_description.last_approved_text: Help the community grow with the harvest.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Help the community grow with the harvest.

short_description.last_approved_text: China is held steady by the contributions of its people.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: China is held steady by the contributions of its people.

short_description.last_approved_text: All will be seen. All will be documented. All will be reported.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: All will be seen. All will be documented. All will be reported.

short_description.last_approved_text: Look to the inspectors in times of need; they will know what to do, when to do it, and where.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Look to the inspectors in times of need; they will know what to do, when to do it, and where.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is often power unseen that affects the greatest change; subtle, but seismic.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: It is often power unseen that affects the greatest change; subtle, but seismic.

short_description.last_approved_text: So long as you do as told, and pay as told, life will be harmonious.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: So long as you do as told, and pay as told, life will be harmonious.

short_description.last_approved_text: He who controls what the emperor knows, controls the emperor.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: He who controls what the emperor knows, controls the emperor.

short_description.last_approved_text: Justice is delivered by the courts of men, beneath the watch of heaven.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Justice is delivered by the courts of men, beneath the watch of heaven.

short_description.last_approved_text: Look to your leaders for guidance, for they are your shield and sword of justice.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Look to your leaders for guidance, for they are your shield and sword of justice.

short_description.last_approved_text: Justice flows from the emperor, through his administrators, to the people below.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Justice flows from the emperor, through his administrators, to the people below.

short_description.last_approved_text: Knowledge stored is knowledge remembered; an archive of truth that lasts forever.

building_short_description_texts.short_description: Knowledge stored is knowledge remembered; an archive of truth that lasts forever.
